info.name: Spotify Clone API
info.description: Complete API collection for Spotify Clone with authentication, search, player controls, and file uploads

variable.description: UUID of the public playlist to follow

request.description: Follow a public playlist to add it to your library. Cannot follow private playlists or your own playlists.

variable.description: UUID of the playlist to unfollow

request.description: Unfollow a playlist to remove it from your library. You must be currently following the playlist.

query.description: image, audio, or omit for all
